warning.title: Important Security Notice
warning.description: This feature splits your private key into encrypted pieces. If you lose your passphrase, you will NOT be able to recover your key. Write it down and store it safely.

totalShards.label: How many people do you want to trust?
totalShards.description: Your key will be split into this many pieces. Each trusted person gets one piece.

threshold.label: How many pieces are needed to recover?
threshold.description: You'll need to collect at least this many pieces to recover your key.

explanation.title: What does this mean?
explanation.description: You're creating {{totalShards}} pieces. To recover your key, you'll need any {{threshold}} of those pieces. So if some friends lose their piece, you can still recover as long as {{threshold}} friends still have theirs.

trustees.label: Who do you trust?
trustees.description: Add the people you trust to hold pieces of your backup. Each person will get one encrypted piece.

warning.title: Never Forget This Passphrase
warning.description: Your backup pieces are encrypted with this passphrase. If you forget it, your backup is useless. There is no password recovery. Write it down and keep it safe.
